name: Bella Muerte
description:
- Welcome to the house -

Bella Muerte is a 2D Graphic Adventure in development for PC and Mobile devices. It has a unique and intriguing story, full of suspense. 

You are going to be part of it, exploring the entirety of a paranormal house and discovering what happened with its inhabitants. 

Depending on the decisions, the story may change.

This House is full of mysteries... Solve puzzles and interact with the family to survive.

The Prologue and Chapter 1 are now available for free! Take a look.
